name: SOCHUM
title: SOCHUM
description:
Agenda Items:

1 - Tackling the Child Labour in Sub- Saharan region

2 - Tackling down the hunger and poverty being caused by the rapid growth of population in Asia

Progress against child labour appears to have stalled in Africa. Child labour went up in Sub-Saharan Africa over the 2012 to 2016 period, in contrast to continued progress elsewhere in the world, and despite the targeted policies implemented by African governments to combat child labour. It is likely that the retrogression was driven in important part by broader economic and demographic forces acting against government efforts, although this matter would require further research. The Africa region has also been among those most affected by situations of state fragility and crisis, which in turn heighten the risk of child labour. In this years Karmun the delegates are going to be stepping in the shoes of politicians and construct solutions to liberate the children from the chains of hazardous Labour.

name: DISEC
title: DISEC
description:
Agenda Items:

1 - Dismantling the weapons of mass destruction

2 - Establishing stricter regulations against the increasing demand for nuclear energy

The Disarmament and International Security Committee (DISEC) is one of six main committees at the General Assembly of the United Nations. It is a committee which aims to increase security and supports demilitarization in all countries also it offers solutions for security, disarmament and global security around the world. The DISEC committee is also responsible for promoting, establishing and maintaining global peace. The first agenda item focuses on finding ways to dismantling the weapons of mass destruction. Delegates will discuss the implications of such decisions and hopefully come across a resolution that all the nations of the world can agree upon. The second agenda item is about establishing stricter regulations against the increasing demand for nuclear energy. For this agenda item delegates are expected to find an effective and permanent solution to the problem at hand

name: International Court of Justice
title: ICJ
description:
Within this court, judges are tasked to determine jurisdiction regarding Ukraine's application in the case of “Allegations of Genocide under the Convention on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide” (Ukraine v. Russian Federation). This case, launched by Ukraine, was officially presented to the International Court of Justice on February 26, 2022, against the Russian Federation. The proceedings of the court necessitate a thorough evaluation and discussion of potential evidence from both the Claimant and Defendant sides, alongside vital testimonies from witnesses unfolding on essential aspects that require clarification. Moreover, objective case-related factors should be inspected precisely to ensure a fair and informed legal process.

name: OPEC
title: OPEC+
description:
Agenda Items:

1 - Russian-Ukrainian war's impact on oil sales and price.

The Organisation of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) is an organization enabling the co-operation of leading oil-producing countries in order to collectively influence the global oil market and maximize profit. It was founded on 14 September 1960 in Baghdad by the first five members (Iran, Iraq, Kuwait, Saudi Arabia, and Venezuela). The 13 member countries account for an estimated 30 percent of global oil production and 80 percent of the world's proven oil reserves . Russian invasion of Ukraine left the world more economically divided than ever , on one side the western countries announcing sanctions against Russia and on the other side countries like China , India increasing their oil purchases.Biden announced a ban on oil from Russia, telling reporters, "We're banning all imports of Russian oil and gas energy.Minister for Economic Affairs Robert Habeck cautioned, "If we do not obtain more gas next winter and if deliveries from Russia were to be cut then we would not have enough gas to heat all our houses and keep all our industry going. In the first three months since the start of the invasion of Ukraine, Russia earned $24 billion from selling energy to China and India.About 20 percent of Russia's oil exports went to China, Russia's largest single buyer as of November 2021. In this years Karmun the delegates are going to be restoring the order in a broken alliance and making sure that this opposition won’t be the start of an international crises .Be prepared to participate in fierce debates that you can never forget.

name: AUGUST COUP
title: Cabinet August Coup
description:
Open Agenda:

The USSR turned into a boiling pot after Mikhail Gorbachev became the General Secretary of the CPSU, he started reformation efforts to move into a more democratic era, which angered many hardline communists. They opposed Gorbachev's reform program, were angry at the loss of control over Eastern European states, and were fearful of the USSR's New Union Treaty which was on the verge of being signed. It is now up to the officials of the USSR to decide the Soviet Unions' fate in KARMUN’23.

name: Siege of Nagykanizsa
title: Cabinet Siege of Nagykanizsa (1601)
description:
Open Agenda:

Nagykanizsa fell to Tiryaki Hasan Pasha in 1600, and the Ottoman Pasha took command of the fort with a garrison of 7,000 men. The captured town became the capital of Kanije Eyalet, an administrative unit of the Ottoman Empire that lasted until the empire's collapse at the end of the century. Kanije Eyalet combined the territory around Nagykanizsa with Zigetvar Eyalet, established in 1596 from parts of Bosnia and another province. This new Ottoman province was only twenty miles from the Austrian duchy of Styria and "caused consternation at the imperial court and at the Holy See." Clement VIII decreed a third invasion of Hungary, this time under his nephew Gian Francesco Aldobrandini. The Ottoman army pulled most of its soldiers from the region after these conquests. Ferdinand II, commander of the Habsburg coalition army, saw an opportunity and laid siege to Nagykanizsa on 9 September 1601 with an army of 100,000 men, cutting all supply routes to the fortress. It is now up to the brave defenders to protect the banner of the Ottoman Empire in KARMUN’23.

name: Civil War
title: JCC
description: The Galactic Civil War, also referred to as the revolution or the Rebellion, was a galactic power struggle in which the Alliance to Restore the Republic waged a rebellion against the ruling Galactic Empire in an attempt to restore democratic rule to the galaxy lasting from 4 BBY to 5 ABY. The origins of rebellion could be traced to the Clone Wars, when rebel cells were equipped by the Galactic Republic and the Jedi Order to fight against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. After Supreme Chancellor Palpatine, secretly the Sith Lord Darth Sidious, transformed the Republic into the Empire and destroyed the Jedi Order, many rebel cells began fighting the Empire. A number of these cells eventually joined together and became the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
